alert.note: Alert for Gladwin (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 31 at 1:51PM EDT until April 04 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: .An inch to an inch and a half of rain since yesterday has caused considerable rises on the Cedar, Tobacco, and Tittabawassee rivers. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Northern Lower Michigan, including the following county, Gladwin. * WHEN...Through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - County Emergency Management has reported considerable rises on rivers in the county, and river levels are continuing to rise. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
